alert.note: Alert for DeSoto (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Tornado Warning issued January 03 at 5:59AM CST until January 03 at 6:15AM CST by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...A TORNADO WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 615 AM CST FOR NORTHEASTERN DESOTO COUNTY... At 559 AM CST, a severe thunderstorm capable of producing a tornado was located near Hernando, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Tornado. SOURCE...Radar indicated rotation. IMPACT...Flying debris will be dangerous to those caught without shelter. Mobile homes will be damaged or destroyed. Damage to roofs, windows, and vehicles will occur. Tree damage is likely. Locations impacted include... Olive Branch, Lewisburg, Cedarview, Fairhaven, Miller and Handy Corner. TORNADO...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN
info.instruction: TAKE COVER NOW! Move to a storm shelter or an interior room on the lowest floor of a sturdy building. Avoid windows. If you are outdoors, in a mobile home, or in a vehicle, move to the closest substantial shelter and protect yourself from flying debris.
